Measure.name: # Order items
Measure.description: The number of ordered products

Measure.name: # Orders
Measure.description: The number of valid orders (orders with an invoice)

Measure.name: Product revenue
Measure.description: The price of the ordered products as shown in the cart

Measure.name: Shipping revenue
Measure.description: Revenue generated based on the price of the items and delivery fee

CalculatedMember.name: Revenue
CalculatedMember.description: The total cart value of the order

CalculatedMember.name: Avg. revenue per order item
CalculatedMember.description: The average revenue made in this order per order item

Measure.name: Avg. days since last order
Measure.description: Average number of days after the last order fulfillment by this seller

Measure.name: # Orders
Measure.description: Number of orders with at-least one item fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: # Order items
Measure.description: Number of items fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: # Deliveries
Measure.description: Number of orders (with at-least one item fulfilled by this seller) that were already delivered to the customer

Measure.name: # Customers
Measure.description: Number of customers with items fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: Revenue (lifetime)
Measure.description: The lifetime revenue generated of items fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: Total freight value
Measure.description: Total freight value of items fulfilled by this seller

CalculatedMember.name: Avg. revenue per order
CalculatedMember.description: The average revenue that the seller made per order

Measure.name: # Orders
Measure.description: Number of orders placed by this customer

Measure.name: # Order items
Measure.description: Number of items purchased by this customer

Measure.name: CLV
Measure.description: The lifetime revenue generated from items purchased by this customer

Measure.name: Total shipping value
Measure.description: The total shipping value payed by this customer

CalculatedMember.name: AOV
CalculatedMember.description: The average revenue per order of the customer

Cube.name: Products
Cube.description: Products that were at least once sold

Dimension.name: Product category
Dimension.description: The category name describing the group of products (e.g. "health_beuty" or "computers_accessories

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All Product category

Measure.name: # Order items
Measure.description: How many times this product has been sold (at the time of the last DWH import)

Measure.name: Revenue (all time)
Measure.description: The revenue generated from the product since the beginning it has been sold

Measure.name: Total shipping value
Measure.description: Total shipping value payed for this product since the beginning it has been sold

Cube.name: Leads
Cube.description: Leads that made contact through filling a request of contact on a landing page. Can becomesellers if they close a deal with a Sales Representative

Dimension.name: Is closed deal
Dimension.description: Whether the qualified lead closed a deal with a Sales Representative and became a seller

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All Is closed deal

Dimension.name: First contact date
Dimension.description: The date the lead made first contact by signing up on a landing page

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All first contact dates
Hierarchy.name: By month

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All first contact dates
Hierarchy.name: By week

Dimension.name: Landing page ID
Dimension.description: The ID of the landing page where the lead first made contact

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All Landing page ID

Dimension.name: Advertising channel
Dimension.description: Specific advertising channel the lead was acquired on

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All Advertising channel

Dimension.name: Deal date
Dimension.description: The date when the marketing qualified lead was closed and became a seller

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All deal dates
Hierarchy.name: By month

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All deal dates
Hierarchy.name: By week

Dimension.name: Business Segment
Dimension.description: The business segment in which the seller provides products e.g., "household_utilities", "car_accessories". Provided by the lead on the sign up at a landing page or the first contact with a Sales Development Representative

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All Business Segment

Dimension.name: Lead type
Dimension.description: The type of the lead in terms of company size, type, and experience, e.g., "online_beginner", "online_medium". Provided by the lead on the sign up at a landing page or the first contact with a Sales Development Representative

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All Lead type

Dimension.name: Lead behaviour profile
Dimension.description: The behaviour profile of the lead based on the DISC behavior assessment tool (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DISC_assessment). Identified by the Sales Development Representative on the first contact with the lead

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All Lead behaviour profile

Dimension.name: Has company
Dimension.description: Whether the lead has a company with formal documentation

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All Has company

Dimension.name: Has GTIN
Dimension.description: Whether the lead has a Global Trade Item Number (barcode) for his products

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All Has GTIN

Dimension.name: Average stock
Dimension.description: The average number of items per product the lead has available on stock. Provided by the lead on the sign up at a landing page or the first contact with a Sales Development Representative

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All Average stock

Dimension.name: Business type
Dimension.description: The type of business the lead has: reseller, manufacturer, other, or unknown

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All Business type

Measure.name: Declared product catalog size
Measure.description: Lead declared catalog size. Informed on contact

Measure.name: Declared monthly revenue
Measure.description: Lead declared estimated monthly revenue. Informed on contact

Measure.name: # Orders
Measure.description: Number of orders with at-least one item fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: # Order items
Measure.description: Number of items fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: # Deliveries
Measure.description: Number of orders (with at-least one item fulfilled by this seller) that were already delivered to the customer

Measure.name: CLV
Measure.description: The lifetime revenue generated of items fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: Total shipping value
Measure.description: Total shipping value of items fulfilled by this seller
